title: Probing the metalloproteome: an 8-mercaptoquinoline motif enriches minichromosome maintenance complex components as significant metalloprotein targets in live cells
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,776-786
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00053F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sean M. McKenna, Bogdan I. Florea, Daniela M. Zisterer, Sander I. van Kasteren, Joanna F. McGouran
A mercaptoquinoline based photo affinity probe for profiling metalloproteins was developed and applied in live cell assays, identifying several novel, therapeutically significant protein targets.
